title: MegaManX Collection - PKG [PS3] (PS2 classics) 4.21+
description:
MegaManX collection converted into a ps2 classic so it will work on ps3. The collections contains MegaManX 1-6. Works on Rebug 4.21+ and Rogero 4.41.

Comes with MegaManX.pkg, the .rap, reActpsn 2.26, and instructions.

If you want to find your game save after finishing a stage, it's in the password section.

 If you already have a custom ps2 classic installed,
or ps2 classics place holder installed then all you
have to do is install the pkg file.

If you've never played MegaManX, you definitely should!


Instructions

1. Place all files except the text document on a flash drive.

2. Install both package files. (Unless you already have reActpsn)

3. Keep the flash drive still connected to ps3 for now.

4. Make a new user and name it "aa".

5. Log in as user aa.

6. Open reactpsn and DO NOT press any buttons.

7. Your ps3 should reboot, press x on the first screen, circle on the next.

8. Play the game!
